Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: Worry not, we are fixing the issue https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-6969

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~elli-androulaki I believe there is a plan for handling expirations gracefully, as well as an existing Jira item. Assuming that is true, please mark this one as duplicate/Done and link to the Jira work item where expirations will be handled.
